summary: Less is More - A minimal color scheme
name: less.vim
description:
Less is More: A minimal color scheme.

Set on a Black background w/ LightGray as normal text. Similar to a typical unix console.  Designed to work equally well on 8 or 16 colors, terminal or gui. 

Based on Jeff Solomon's highlights @ http://www-vlsi.stanford.edu/~jsolomon/vim/
Check out his syntax files. Nice improvements for C, Perl, Tcl, and others.
